messages.title: A Fresh Start for Putney, Roehampton and Southfields

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A pro-European and 100% remain. Brexit is a threat to our economy. We will provide the referendum needed to make sure we keep the benefits of EU membership, send no fewer than 6 MPs to parliament to support a People's Vote.

Our NHS is under threat from Tory privatisation and our staff, the latest victim of Donald Trump. Labour will provide the additional staffing and resources needed to make sure our NHS stays true to its founding values.
Labour's ambitious programme includes leading the way in the new Green Regeneration Fund, more affordable housing, and a better deal for renters.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: John Hosle on Brexit, Boris Johnson
mentions.tacticalSituation: Locally the contest is between Labour and the Conservatives.

issues.brexitEurope: Proudly Remain. 100% Remain and supports a People's Vote. We can still stop Boris Johnson's harmful Brexit.
issues.education: She'll stand up for issues like Heathrow, clean air, and local schools
issues.environment: I will take urgent action to cut carbon emissions and clean our air.
issues.health: Standing up for our NHS. Our NHS is under threat from Tory privatisation, more funding for NHS, additional staffing and resources.

community.content: Fixing the Housing Crisis, affordable housing, and a better deal for renters.

contactInformation.address: Freepost, Fleur for Putney, 35 Felsham Road SW15 1AY

endorsements.endorsement: We need a fresh start. I'm supporting Fleur because she's 100% Remain and supports a People's Vote. She'll stand up for us on issues like Heathrow, clean air, and local schools.

images.caption: Vote Fleur Anderson, Labour candidate for Putney
